title: 165+ best extended Amazon Cyber Monday deals still available
body_text:
Don’t cry because Amazon Cyber Monday is over. We found the very last few extended Cyber Monday sales to help you buy gifts for your cousins. You know….for giving Tuesday.
How about a little holiday Q and A?
Q: “What’s the difference between Black Friday and extended Cyber Monday sales? Put differently: Amazon extended Cyber Monday vs. Black Friday” A: Like the brand’s Black Friday Week sale, Amazon Cyber Monday 2024 is better than almost anyone else’s out there, with thousands of dollars of savings to be had across all categories. Plus, they just keep it going longer.
Wondering where to find the best extended Cyber Monday deals? Then you’ve come to the right place, because below, we’ve rounded up our 200+ favorite post Amazon Cyber Monday deals available today, featuring huge, doorbuster deals on brands like Apple, Dyson, DeWalt, Shark, Samsung, LEGO, and many, many more.
What’s more, brands like Carl Fredrik, Petal & Pup and Savage x Fenty are all hosting incredible Cyber Monday deals.
Below, we’ve rounded up our favorite deals by category. Use the links to navigate to your preferred section, or simply scroll to take in all of what Amazon’s extended Cyber Monday sale has to offer.
Happy shopping!
Best Extended Amazon Cyber Monday Deals 2024
- Best Cyber Monday Amazon Apple Deals
- Best Cyber Monday Amazon Beauty Deals
- Best Cyber Monday Amazon Home Deals
- Best Cyber Monday Amazon Tool Deals
- Best Cyber Monday Amazon Kitchen and Appliance Deals
- Best Cyber Monday Amazon Tech and TV Deals
- Best Cyber Monday Amazon Gaming Deals
- Best Cyber Monday Amazon Clothes Deals
- Best Cyber Monday Amazon Fitness Deals
- Best Cyber Monday Amazon Toy Deals
Best Extended Cyber Monday Amazon Deals
Best Extended Cyber Monday Amazon Apple Deals
Apple AirPods 4 Wireless Earbuds
Experience seamless audio with Apple AirPods 4, designed for effortless pairing and exceptional sound quality. These wireless earbuds offer active noise cancellation, ensuring immersive listening in any environment. With intuitive touch controls and an ergonomic fit, they provide comfort during extended use. Enjoy up to 30 hours of battery life with the charging case.
Beats Studio Pro
The Beats Studio Pro headphones deliver an immersive audio experience with superior sound quality and adaptive noise cancellation. Featuring a sleek design, they offer wireless connectivity and a long-lasting battery life. Built for comfort, these headphones also include intuitive touch controls for effortless navigation, making them perfect for any music lover.
Apple Watch Series 10 [GPS 42mm case]
The Apple Watch Series 10 (GPS) features a 42mm case and offers enhanced health and fitness features. With a larger display, it supports heart rate monitoring, activity tracking, and notifications right on your wrist. This model is perfect for those looking to track their fitness journey without cellular connectivity.
Apple Watch Series 10 [GPS + Cellular 42mm case]
The Apple Watch Series 10 (GPS + Cellular) with a 42mm case brings ultimate convenience with its cellular connectivity. Stay connected on the go, make calls, stream music, and access apps without needing your phone. It’s perfect for active users who want independence and seamless integration with their Apple ecosystem.
Beats Solo 4
The Beats Solo 4 wireless headphones offer exceptional sound quality with enhanced bass and a sleek design. Equipped with the Apple H1 chip, they provide seamless pairing with Apple devices, and up to 22 hours of battery life. Their comfortable fit and adjustable headband make them ideal for on-the-go use.
Apple 2022 MacBook Air Laptop with M2 Chip
The Apple 2022 MacBook Air with the M2 chip presents a balanced mix of performance and portability. With improved processing power, a thinner profile, and an excellent Retina display, it’s ideal for professionals and students alike who value efficiency.
Apple 2024 MacBook Pro Laptop with M4 Pro
The 2024 Apple MacBook Pro with the M4 Pro chip offers a boost in performance and graphics power. Ideal for professionals, it provides superior computing speeds, enhanced battery life, and a stunning display, making it suitable for demanding workflows and creative tasks.
Gogogo Sport Vpro GS03 Laser Golf Rangefinder
The Gogogo Sport Vpro GS03 Laser Golf Rangefinder is a precision tool designed for golfers seeking accuracy on the course. With a range of up to 650 yards, it features clear optics, multiple measurement modes, and a compact design. Lightweight and easy to use, it enhances your game by providing reliable distance readings.
Best Cyber Monday Amazon Beauty Deals
IT Cosmetics Confidence in a Cream Anti Aging Face Moisturizer
IT Cosmetics Confidence in a Cream is a rich, hydrating anti-aging moisturizer designed to improve skin texture and elasticity. Its formula includes a blend of peptides, collagen, hyaluronic acid, and antioxidants to nourish and rejuvenate the skin. It’s suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin, offering long-lasting hydration.
Dyson Airwrap
The Dyson Airwrap is a versatile hair styling tool that uses air to curl, wave, smooth, and volumize hair without extreme heat. Its intelligent heat control protects hair from damage, while multiple attachments cater to different hair types and styles. Ideal for creating salon-quality results at home.
Paula’s Choice CLINICAL 20% Niacinamide
Minimize pores and promote healthier skin with Paula’s Choice Niacinamide 20% Treatment. It’s light, good for all skin types, and 24% off for Cyber Monday.
TATCHA The Dewy Skin Cream
Banish dry winter skin with cult-beauty favorite TATCHA The Dewy Skin Cream. The rich moisturizer is filled with natural ingredients that hydrate and plump.
Differin Acne Treatment Gel
Along with fighting acne, Differin gel is known to be stellar at fighting signs of aging. Try it for yourself while you can save on this two-pack.
Grande Cosmetics GrandeLASH-MD Lash Enhancing Serum
Loved by celebs and everyone else, the Grande Cosmetics GrandLASH-MD Lash Enhancing Serum makes eye lashes so long and dreamy, people will swear you have falsies on.
Dyson Airstrait Straightener
The Dyson Airstrait Straightener is an innovative hair styling tool that uses a combination of heated air and advanced airflow technology to straighten hair without extreme heat. It offers quick, frizz-free results, protecting hair from heat damage. Its lightweight design and ergonomic features ensure comfort and ease of use.
Dyson Supersonic Hair Dryer
The Dyson Supersonic Hair Dryer offers fast drying with intelligent heat control to prevent damage. Its powerful digital motor and unique design reduce frizz and promote smooth, shiny hair. With multiple heat and speed settings, it’s a must-have for salon-quality styling at home. Perfect for all hair types.
Crest 3D Whitestrips Professional Effects
Brighten your smile with Crest 3D Whitestrips Professional Effects, removing years of stains for a whiter smile. Take advantage of Cyber Monday discounts.
COSRX Snail Mucin 92% Moisturizer
COSRX Snail Mucin 92% Moisturizer is a hydrating skincare product designed to repair and rejuvenate skin. Packed with 92% snail mucin, it promotes moisture retention and helps improve skin texture. The lightweight formula absorbs quickly, making it suitable for all skin types, especially dry or damaged skin, leaving it smooth and nourished.
AquaSonic DUO PRO Electric Toothbrush Set
The AquaSonic DUO PRO includes two ultra-whitening electric toothbrushes with 40,000 VPM motors, 10 ProFlex brush heads, and a UV sanitizing base for ultimate hygiene. With ADA acceptance and smart timers, it’s perfect for couples or families looking for professional-grade oral care. Cyber Weekend is the ideal time to grab this advanced set at a great value.
Olay Super Serum
Olay Super Serum is a powerful skincare product designed to visibly reduce wrinkles, fine lines, and uneven skin tone. Formulated with peptides, niacinamide, and hyaluronic acid, it deeply hydrates and firms the skin. This lightweight serum delivers results quickly, providing a smooth, youthful complexion with consistent use.
COSRX Snail Mucin 96% Power Repairing Essence
A face cream that uses snail secretion to improve your skin? It might sound weird, but according to reviews, it works! With over 71,000 customer ratings on Amazon, the lightweight serum from COSRX is going viral for its repairing and rejuvenating abilities when it comes to face dryness and fine lines.
Peter Thomas Roth Water Drench Hyaluronic Acid Cloud Hydra-Gel Under-Eye Patches
These under-eye patches are packed with hyaluronic acid to deliver deep hydration to the delicate eye area. The cloud-like gel texture helps reduce puffiness, dark circles, and fine lines, leaving skin feeling refreshed and smooth. Perfect for a bright, awake look, even after sleepless nights.
Anastasia Beverly Hills Loose Setting Powder
Anastasia Beverly Hills Loose Setting Powder delivers a flawless finish while locking in makeup for long-lasting wear. This finely milled, lightweight powder blurs imperfections and controls shine without settling into fine lines. Available in multiple shades, it sets makeup with a soft-focus effect, ideal for both oily and dry skin.
IGK GOOD BEHAVIOR Spirulina Protein Smoothing Spray
IGK GOOD BEHAVIOR Spirulina Protein Smoothing Spray is a heat-activated treatment that smooths and protects hair from frizz and humidity. Infused with spirulina protein, it strengthens and restores hair, leaving it silky, shiny, and manageable. This vegan, cruelty-free spray is perfect for those looking to maintain smooth, frizz-free hair.
SOL DE JANEIRO Ultimate Body Cream Bundle
This Sol de Janeiro Trio Bundle combines three best-selling luxurious body creams to pamper and transform your skin: The iconic Brazilian Bum Bum Cream for hydration and smoothing with a hint of shimmer, the Beija Flor Elasti-Cream for collagen-boosting elasticity and youthful radiance, and the Bom Dia Brightening Body Cream to even tone and reduce dark spots with Vitamin C and AHAs. Each cream features a unique, irresistible fragrance, making this set a perfect indulgence or gift.
SOL DE JANEIRO Mist and Match Hair & Body Perfume Bundle
The Sol de Janeiro Mist and Match Hair & Body Perfume Bundle is a luxurious collection of vibrant, tropical-inspired scents designed to uplift and transport you. Featuring versatile mists for both hair and body, this bundle offers long-lasting, irresistible fragrances that evoke sunny beaches, warm caramel, and exotic florals, perfect for everyday indulgence or layering with matching body creams.
Shark FlexStyle Air Styling & Drying System
The Shark FlexStyle Air Styling & Drying System is a versatile hair tool that transforms from a powerful hair dryer to a multi-styler with various attachments for curling, volumizing, and smoothing. Featuring no-heat-damage technology and adjustable heat and speed settings, it offers fast drying and styling for all hair types while regulating temperature to minimize heat exposure.
Revlon One Step Volumizer
The Revlon One Step Volumizer PLUS dries and styles hair for an easy, salon-approved blowout. With four different heat settings and a user-friendly handle, this brush will leave you with a shiny, voluminous mane in half the time. Multiple members of our commerce team swear by it.
RELATED: Why the Revlon One-Step Hair Dryer Brush is worth the hype
Best Cyber Monday Amazon Home Deals
AncestryDNA + Traits Genetic Test Kit
The AncestryDNA + Traits Genetic Test Kit provides insights into both your ancestral origins and unique genetic traits. It offers detailed ethnicity estimates and connects you to potential relatives. Additionally, it reveals traits like eye color, taste preferences, and more, giving a comprehensive view of your genetic makeup and heritage.
BISSELL Little Green Multi-Purpose Portable Carpet and Upholstery Cleaner
The BISSELL Little Green Multi-Purpose Portable Carpet and Upholstery Cleaner is a compact, powerful cleaning tool designed for tough stains and spills. Its lightweight design, combined with strong suction and stain-fighting formula, makes it ideal for carpets, upholstery, stairs, and even car interiors. Easy to use and portable.
Amazon Basics Suitcase
The Amazon Basics Suitcase offers reliable, budget-friendly luggage with a sleek, durable design. Featuring a hard-shell exterior, smooth-rolling wheels, and an expandable compartment for extra packing space, it provides convenience and practicality for travelers. Available in various sizes, it’s a great option for both short and long trips.
iRobot Roomba Vac Robot Vacuum
The iRobot Roomba Vac Robot Vacuum autonomously cleans floors with advanced navigation and smart mapping. It uses multi-surface brushes and powerful suction to tackle dirt, dust, and debris. Ideal for homes with pets, it can be scheduled, controlled via app, and adapts to various floor types for efficient cleaning.
UGG 16804 Euphoria Plush Faux Fur Reversible Throw Blanket
Snuggle up with the UGG Euphoria Plush Faux Fur Reversible Throw Blanket, offering ultimate softness and style for your home. Available during the Cyber Monday sales event.
Aura Digital Picture Frame
Share cherished memories with the Aura Digital Picture Frame, featuring a high-resolution display and unlimited photo storage. Available at a special Cyber Monday price.
Beckham Hotel Collection Bed Pillows
Enhance your sleep experience with the Beckham Hotel Collection Bed Pillows, offering plush comfort and superior support for all sleep positions. Sleep better this season by grabbing this Cyber Monday offer.
RENPHO Heating Pad for Full Back and Neck Pain Relief
Ease back and neck discomfort with the RENPHO Heating Pad for Full Back and Neck Pain Relief, offering soothing warmth and adjustable settings. Warm up this winter by securing this Cyber Monday deal.
Scotch Gift Wrap Tape
Prepare for the holiday season with Scotch Gift Wrap Tape, ensuring your presents look flawless with this easy-to-use, invisible adhesive. Stock up during Cyber Monday deals.
Posca Paint Markers 8-Pack
Unleash your artistic side with the Posca Paint Markers 8-Pack, offering vibrant, opaque colors suitable for multiple surfaces. Get creative this season with Cyber Monday savings.
Chom Chom Roller Pet Hair Remover and Reusable Lint Roller
Keep your home fur-free with the Chom Chom Roller Pet Hair Remover, an eco-friendly tool for tackling pet hair. Get yours during the Cyber Monday sale.
ECOVACS DEEBOT T30S Combo Robot Vacuum and Mop
The ECOVACS DEEBOT T30S offers an innovative cleaning solution with its dual-functionality, seamlessly vacuuming and mopping surfaces. Featuring smart mapping technology, it navigates efficiently, adapting to your home’s layout. Its powerful suction and advanced filtration system ensure a thorough clean, while app control provides convenience for on-the-go maintenance.
Bissell Little Green Pet Deluxe Portable Carpet Cleaner
The Bissell Little Green Pet Deluxe is an effective, portable carpet cleaner designed for homes with pets. It removes tough stains, odors, and dirt from upholstery, carpets, and stairs. Its powerful suction, combined with specialized pet stain formula, tackles messes efficiently, offering convenience and portability for everyday cleaning tasks.
HP Color Laserjet Pro MFP 3301sdw Wireless All-in-One Color Laser Printer
The HP Color Laserjet Pro MFP 3301sdw is a multifunctional printer designed for efficiency. Offering wireless connectivity, it prints, scans, and copies with high-quality color output. Fast performance and a compact footprint make it ideal for home offices. User-friendly features streamline workflow, enhancing productivity while ensuring professional results for all documents.
LEVOIT Air Purifier
The LEVOIT Air Purifier ensures clean air in your home with its HEPA filter, which captures 99.97% of allergens and pollutants. Its compact design fits easily into any room, while the quiet operation makes it perfect for bedrooms. Smart features like filter reminders enhance usability and maintain optimal performance.
TOLOCO Massage Gun
The TOLOCO Massage Gun offers customizable massage experiences with multiple speed settings and interchangeable heads. Ideal for muscle recovery, it effectively relieves tension and soreness. Its ergonomic design ensures comfort during use, and the portable size makes it perfect for both home and travel, enhancing overall wellness wherever you go.
EF ECOFLOW Portable Power Station
The EF ECOFLOW Portable Power Station serves as a reliable energy source for outdoor adventures or emergencies. With multiple output ports, it charges various devices simultaneously, from smartphones to small appliances. Its compact design enhances portability, while fast recharging capabilities ensure you’re always powered up and ready to go.
Graco SlimFit 3-in-1 Convertible Car Seat
The Graco SlimFit 3-in-1 Convertible Car Seat offers ultimate convenience and safety for your growing child. With a space-saving design, it easily transitions from rear-facing to forward-facing and booster mode. Featuring easy-to-adjust harnesses, side-impact protection, and a machine-washable seat cover, it’s the perfect choice for parents seeking comfort, safety, and durability in one car seat.
HiLIFE Steamer for Clothes
The HiLIFE Steamer for Clothes provides a quick and efficient way to remove wrinkles from fabrics. Its compact design makes it ideal for home or travel use. The powerful steam penetrates fabric, ensuring a fresh look without the hassle of ironing. Fast heat-up time enhances convenience for busy lifestyles.
Nectar 12-Inch Queen Mattress
The Nectar 12-Inch Queen Mattress combines support and comfort with its multi-layer construction. Designed for all sleep positions, it features adaptive foam that contours to your body while minimizing motion transfer. With a breathable cover and cooling technology, it enhances sleep quality, providing a restorative experience for restful nights and energized mornings.
Dyson Hot+Cool AM09 Jet Focus Heater and Fan
The Dyson Hot+Cool AM09 Jet Focus Heater and Fan offers year-round climate control with innovative technology. It quickly heats or cools the room, providing a comfortable environment regardless of the season. Sleek and modern in design, it operates quietly and safely, featuring an easy-to-use remote for convenient adjustments at any time.
Amazon Basics 2-Ply Toilet Paper (120 Regular Rolls, 350 Sheets, 30-Pack)
Stock up on the toilet paper essentials this Cyber Monday with 15% off the Amazon Basics 2-Ply Toilet Paper (120 Regular Rolls, 350 Sheets, 30-Pack). More than 100,000 shoppers purchased the bundle in the past month, too.
Frida Baby Thermometer
Frida Baby Thermometer provides quick, accurate temperature readings with a gentle, no-contact infrared sensor. Designed for infants and toddlers, it ensures a hassle-free experience during fever monitoring. The easy-to-read digital display and color-coded indicators help parents assess their child’s temperature at a glance. Ideal for home health care use.
ECOVACS DEEBOT X1 Omni Robot Vacuum and Mop Combo
The ECOVACS DEEBOT X1 Omni offers advanced vacuuming and mopping capabilities in one device. Equipped with intelligent navigation, it efficiently cleans floors while mapping your home’s layout. The integrated mopping system removes dirt and grime, while powerful suction ensures a deep clean. Voice control and app compatibility enhance convenience.
Solo Stove Mesa XL
The Solo Stove Mesa XL is a compact, smokeless tabletop fire pit that creates a warm, inviting ambiance. With its innovative design, it provides efficient heat output with minimal smoke, making it perfect for outdoor gatherings. The stainless steel construction ensures durability, while the portable size suits any space.
Best Cyber Monday Amazon Tool Deals
DeWalt 20V MAX 5 Ah Lithium Ion Battery 2-Pack
The DeWalt 20V MAX 5 Ah Lithium Ion Battery 2-Pack delivers reliable power for a range of tools. Designed for durability and longevity, these batteries are compatible with all 20V MAX tools. Featuring a built-in fuel gauge, users can easily monitor battery life, enhancing productivity and minimizing downtime on projects. Check out our roundup of the best DeWalt deals available on the internet here.
DeWalt 20V Max Cordless Drill/Driver Kit, 2 Batteries and Charger Included
The DeWalt 20V Max Cordless Drill/Driver Kit is a versatile tool for DIY enthusiasts and professionals alike. Equipped with two powerful batteries, it ensures uninterrupted work. Its ergonomic design provides comfort during prolonged use, while multiple torque settings allow precise control for various materials, making every project efficient and effective.
DEWALT 20V MAX Impact Driver
The DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo offers powerful performance for both drilling and driving tasks. With a high-performance motor, compact design, and two-speed transmission, it delivers versatility and control. The lightweight, ergonomic build reduces fatigue during extended use. Ideal for DIY projects or professional work, it includes two 20V MAX lithium-ion batteries for continuous power.
BOSCH ROS20VSC Palm Sander
The BOSCH ROS20VSC Palm Sander offers smooth, swirl-free finishes thanks to its variable-speed control. Its ergonomic design ensures comfort during extended use, while its dust collection system keeps your work area cleaner, making it a great choice for fine woodwork and surface prep.
DeWalt 20V MAX XR Jig Saw
The DeWalt 20V MAX XR Jig Saw offers precise cutting with a high-performance brushless motor. It features a 4-position orbital action for various cuts, an adjustable shoe for stability, and a tool-free blade change system for convenience. Its LED light improves visibility and control during intricate cuts, too.
Best Cyber Monday Amazon Kitchen Deals
Breville the Bambino Plus Espresso Machine
The Breville Bambino Plus Espresso Machine delivers cafe-quality coffee at home with its fast heat-up time and precise temperature control. Featuring an automatic steam wand for velvety microfoam, it’s perfect for lattes and cappuccinos. Compact and user-friendly, this machine is ideal for espresso enthusiasts seeking convenience and performance.
Ninja Blast Portable Blender
You don’t need a huge blender for a quick smoothie. Instead, try out this Ninja Blast Portable Blender, which offers an easy-open sip lid that lets you blend and drink in the same vessel. We’ve heard it’s perfect for a quick post-workout smoothie, and best of all, it’s available for under $50 today on Amazon.
Cuisinart 12 Speed 5.5 Qt. Stand Mixer
The Cuisinart 12-Speed 5.5 Qt. Stand Mixer offers versatility and power for all your mixing needs. Whether you’re kneading dough or whipping cream, its powerful motor and 12-speed settings ensure efficient performance. The large 5.5-quart bowl can handle large batches, while its sleek design adds style to any kitchen countertop.
GE Profile Opal Nugget Ice Maker + Side Tank
Instantly upgrade all your refreshments and cocktails with restaurant-level ice — refreshing, crispy, and even flavorful. Unlike traditional hard cubes, GE Profile Nugget Maker creates perfectly shaped and cooled nuggets as well as compacted ice flakes for all your favorite beverages.
Blackstone 17″ Tabletop Griddle
Yes, Blackstone Cyber Monday deals are here, and we are thrilled about the Blackstone 17″ Tabletop Griddle that’s a No.1 best-seller and 25% off for today only. With a stainless steel front plate and ergonomic design, it’s fit for your next home upgrade.
Crock-Pot Portable Electric Lunch Box
We all love a good meal prep, but nobody loves to eat cold leftovers. The Crock-Pot Portable Electric Lunch Box is your welcome solution, especially in the chilly winter months. This small lunch pot heats meals on the go with a detachable cord and wide carry handle for easy transport.
KitchenAid Semi Automatic Espresso Machine with Burr Grinder
The KitchenAid Semi Automatic Espresso Machine with Burr Grinder delivers café-quality espresso at home, featuring a built-in burr grinder for freshly ground coffee beans. With customizable settings for brewing strength and temperature, this machine allows coffee enthusiasts to enjoy their favorite espresso drinks with ease.
KitchenAid All Purpose Shears
KitchenAid has solidified itself as a quality brand for kitchen essentials. With over 75,000 reviews and a 4.8-star rating on Amazon, the KitchenAid All Purpose Shears are regarded as a staple for getting a clean cut every time. Customers note these kitchen shears have a comfortable grip and are easy to clean. A favorite of kitchen gadgets on Amazon, you need it in your cart.
Breville Espresso Machine
The Breville Espresso Machine delivers barista-quality coffee at home with its precise temperature control, low-pressure pre-infusion, and powerful steam wand for perfect microfoam. This versatile machine offers customizable settings for grind size, dose, and extraction, allowing you to craft your ideal espresso, latte, or cappuccino with professional results.
Keurig K-Elite Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker
The Keurig K-Elite Single Serve Coffee Maker brews a variety of coffee styles using K-Cup pods. With a strong brew setting, it enhances flavor intensity for a richer cup. Featuring an iced coffee mode, it also has a 75oz water reservoir for fewer refills and fast, convenient brewing.
HENCKELS Premium Quality 15-Piece Knife Set with Block
This HENCKELS knife set combines professional-grade craftsmanship and precision. Featuring high-carbon stainless steel blades, each knife is designed for durability and sharpness. The ergonomic handles ensure comfort during use. The included block offers safe storage and easy access, making this set perfect for home chefs or culinary enthusiasts.
Ninja CREAMi Deluxe 11-in-1 Ice Cream & Frozen Treat Maker
The Ninja CREAMi Deluxe makes homemade frozen desserts a breeze, offering 11 versatile functions to create everything from ice cream to sorbet. Its powerful motor ensures smooth textures, while the intuitive controls allow for precise consistency adjustments. Ideal for crafting personalized frozen treats with ease and convenience. Check out our review of the Ninja CREAMi here.
Caraway Cookware+ Collection
The Caraway Cookware+ Collection offers a premium cooking experience with non-toxic ceramic-coated pots and pans. The set features a sleek design and is free from harmful chemicals like PTFE, PFOA, and PFAS. With its even heat distribution, it ensures healthier cooking while being easy to clean and maintain.
Best Cyber Monday Amazon Tech and TV Deals
Sony WH-1000XM5 The Best Wireless Noise Canceling Headphones
The Sony WH-1000XM5 offers exceptional sound quality with industry-leading noise cancellation. Featuring a comfortable, lightweight design, these headphones provide up to 30 hours of battery life and touch controls for easy operation. Perfect for travel or work, they deliver crystal-clear audio and immersive listening experiences in any environment.
ASUS Chromebook CX1
The ASUS Chromebook CX1 is a budget-friendly, lightweight laptop perfect for everyday tasks. Featuring a 15.6-inch Full HD display, efficient Intel processors, and up to 8GB RAM, it offers smooth performance for web browsing, productivity apps, and media consumption. Long battery life and rugged design make it ideal for students and professionals.
TCL 98-Inch Q65 QLED 4K UHD Smart TV
The TCL 98-Inch Q65 QLED TV offers breathtaking picture quality with vivid colors and sharp details. Equipped with 4K resolution and Dolby Vision, it enhances cinematic experiences. The integrated Roku platform provides seamless access to streaming services, while the sleek design ensures an elegant addition to any living room.
Roku Streaming Stick 4K
The Roku Streaming Stick 4K offers seamless access to a wide range of streaming services with 4K resolution and HDR support. Its compact design plugs directly into your TV’s HDMI port, providing a clutter-free setup. With the Roku app, users can easily control content and discover new shows and movies.
Amazon Echo Show 5 (newest model)
The Echo Show 5 (newest model) features a 5.5-inch display and Alexa voice assistant for hands-free control of smart devices. It supports video calls, streaming music, and watching videos. With improved sound quality and compact size, it’s ideal for any room, offering a versatile and practical addition to a smart home.
LG 65-Inch Class OLED evo G4 Series Smart TV
Already keeping your eye out for Amazon Cyber Monday TV deals? The LG 65-Inch Class OLED evo G4 Series Smart TV boasts stunning picture quality with deep blacks and vibrant colors. Its advanced technology enhances contrast, providing an immersive viewing experience. Equipped with smart features, it supports popular streaming services, making entertainment accessible. Sleek design complements any living space, elevating home aesthetics.
SAMSUNG Galaxy Tab A9+ Plus 11” 64GB Android Tablet
The SAMSUNG Galaxy Tab A9+ boasts an 11-inch display, providing vibrant visuals for streaming and browsing. With 64GB of storage, it supports a variety of apps and multimedia. Its long battery life and lightweight design make it ideal for on-the-go use, while the sleek interface enhances user experience seamlessly.
INIU Portable Charger
The INIU Portable Charger offers a sleek and compact solution for charging devices on the go. With high capacity, it supports multiple charges for smartphones and tablets. Its fast charging technology ensures quick power boosts, while the lightweight design makes it easy to carry, perfect for travel or daily use.
HP Newest 255 G10 Laptop
The HP 255 G10 laptop is an affordable, business-ready device. Featuring a reliable processor, a full-size keyboard, and essential connectivity, it ensures productive work in various environments. This laptop is ideal for cost-conscious users seeking professional-grade performance.
ASUS Vivobook Go 15.6” FHD Slim Laptop
The ASUS Vivobook Go 15.6” offers solid performance in a slim form factor. With a Full HD display, long battery life, and efficient processing, it delivers essential functionality for both work and entertainment, making it a well-rounded laptop for everyday use.
Best Cyber Monday Amazon Gaming Deals
PlayStation VR2 Horizon Call of The Mountain Bundle
The PlayStation VR2 Horizon Call of the Mountain Bundle offers an immersive virtual reality experience with a cutting-edge VR headset and the acclaimed game “Horizon Call of the Mountain.” Dive into stunning landscapes and interact with the world of Horizon like never before, combining the latest VR technology with an epic adventure.
Madden NFL 25 for PlayStation 5
Madden NFL 25 for PlayStation 5 delivers an immersive football gaming experience with stunning graphics and realistic gameplay. Featuring improved AI and player animations, it offers deeper control for both offense and defense. The game includes multiple modes, including Franchise and Ultimate Team, ensuring hours of dynamic and competitive fun for sports enthusiasts.
Best Cyber Monday Amazon Clothes Deals
Koolaburra by UGG Women’s Tizzey Slipper
We all know that Zoomers have an affinity for cozy athleisure wear. If there was a single house shoe they’d wear every single day, we’d guess it was a pair of UGG slippers. Now’s the time to snag a new pair, and set yourself up for a couple more months of stylish winter lounging.
adidas Men’s Daily 4.0 Shoes
The adidas Men’s Daily 4.0 Shoes combine classic sneaker style with modern comfort. Featuring a durable leather upper, they offer a supportive fit and a cushioned insole for all-day wear. The versatile design pairs well with various outfits, making them perfect for both casual and active lifestyles.
PGA TOUR Men’s Flat Front Golf Pant
Step onto the course in style with a pair of Flat Front gold pants. These tailored trousers feature a hidden elastic waistband that contracts up to four inches to move with you. Plus, the fabric offers sun protection. Doesn’t get much better than that.
Trendy Queen Womens Oversized Hoodie
The Trendy Queen Women’s Oversized Hoodie offers a relaxed, cozy fit with a soft fabric blend for maximum comfort. Its casual design features a spacious hood, kangaroo pockets, and ribbed cuffs, making it perfect for layering. Ideal for lounging or running errands, it provides both style and practicality.
ANRABESS Women’s Open Front Knit Lightweight Cardigan
The ANRABESS Women’s Open Front Knit Lightweight Cardigan is a versatile layering piece made from soft, breathable fabric. Its open-front design and relaxed fit make it easy to pair with any outfit. Whether worn over a dress or paired with jeans, this cardigan provides cozy style without feeling too heavy.
LILLUSORY Women’s Oversized Turtleneck Sweater
The LILLUSORY Women’s Oversized Turtleneck Sweater is perfect for cooler months, offering both warmth and stylish comfort. With a relaxed, slouchy fit and a cozy, knitted turtleneck, it provides a laid-back look. Its versatile design pairs well with jeans or leggings, making it ideal for casual outings or cozy indoor days.
florence by mills Women’s Cozy Crush Jogger
The florence by mills Women’s Cozy Crush Jogger is designed for comfort and relaxation. Made from ultra-soft, breathable fabric, it offers a cozy fit perfect for lounging or casual outings. The joggers feature a flattering, relaxed silhouette and a drawstring waist for an adjustable, easygoing look.
Fossil Neutra Women’s Watch
The Fossil Neutra Women’s Watch combines timeless design with modern features. With a minimalist dial and sleek stainless steel case, it adds sophistication to any outfit. The watch is water-resistant and powered by reliable quartz movement, making it both stylish and functional for everyday wear, ideal for any occasion.
New Balance Men’s Fresh Foam X 1440 V1 Running Shoe
The New Balance Men’s Fresh Foam X 1440 V1 Running Shoe is engineered for superior comfort and performance. Your Black Friday & Cyber Monday FAQs, answered by experts
Are Black Friday sales still available?
Good news! Many of the best Black Friday sales have been extended through the weekend. Don’t wait in the cold for stores like Walmart to open and fight the crowds to score the most popular gifts — we found all the deals you can shop from the comfort of your own home.
When is Cyber Monday 2025?
Kick off December with the online shopping sale of the year on Monday, December 1, 2025.
Which is better: Black Friday or Cyber Monday?
It depends! Black Friday shoppers may benefit from higher inventory on sell-out-risk items, while Cyber Monday may bring steeper discounts and incentives — depending on where you shop. We recommend making a strategic plan to maximize your savings without missing out on the items you want the most.
When is Travel Tuesday 2025?
Jet-setters rejoice: Travel Tuesday, with its great deals on flights, hotels, cruises, all-inclusives and more, will take place on Tuesday, December 2, 2025.
Is it worth it?
Absolutely! Black Friday and Cyber Monday bring some of the biggest sales of the year on big-ticket tech items such as AirPods, popular gifts like the Dyson Airwrap, clothing and shoes, top kids toys, and so much more.
Where can I find the best deals?
Right here! Follow Post Wanted shopping insiders for updates on all the Black Friday, Cyber Monday and Travel Tuesday deals worth shopping in 2025.
